Purpose: Comprehensive manual testing guide for all features

column9: Medical cert, fitness cert, URL generation

column1: 1. Download this file and all TEST_XX_*.csv files to your computer
2. Open each file in Excel or Google Sheets
3. Follow the step-by-step instructions for each test
4. Use the Test Data column - copy and paste values exactly
5. Mark Status as you test: ☐ = Not Started
6. Add notes/observations in the Notes column
8. Screenshots can reference in "Screenshot" column for complex tests
1. START: Authentication tests (must work to test anything else)
- Each test is self-contained and step-numbered
- Test data is provided - no need to improvise
- Expected results are explicit - you know exactly what success looks like
- Status column has emoji checkboxes - easy to mark
- Keep notes brief - one line is fine
- Don't worry about perfect testing order - do what feels right
- Break into smaller sessions if needed - each test is ~5-15 minutes
- Save your progress frequently in the CSV
- You can pause and resume anytime
All users share test database with seeded data
1. Note the exact error message in "Issue Details"
3. Check TEST_DATA_REFERENCE.csv for correct test data
4. Try test again - sometimes timing issues
5. If consistently fails - ISSUE FOUND (mark as ❌ Fail)
